A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie was an absolute train wreck. There are so many things wrong with it- but I'll try to narrow it down to 10 horrible things:

1. Flying Iron Man Leia
2. Grumpy but also quickly agreeable bi polar Luke
3. Snoke dies during the 2nd act. It's completely anticlimactic. 
4. Luke's character is portrayed as weak\, Rey hoops him with a stick. He doesn't even use the force or act like a Jedi? He promise to show her
 stuff and shows her nothing. 
5. Holdo and Poe. What is up with that attempt at a plot twist?
6. Did we really have to load the film with Vegan\,anti-male rhetoric?
7. Luke doesn't get emotional or 
excited to see Chewie or R2 and never actually sees leia or leaves the island. 
8. Luke dies without doing anything whatsoever for no reason. He's just tired I guess. Good reason to vanish into thin air. 
9. Kylo is suddenly the emperor? 
10. Why is Rose even in this movie? Or Benicio? Seriously they couldn't bring back Lando or something?

Basically this is the worst corporate attempt to stomp out the oceans bring in the new profitable regime I've ever seen. Rose got more done than Luke Skywalker. Don't waste a dime.
